title: Bibliography on Calligraphy
content:
Hello. I opened the section on calligraphy :  
 [http://www.as8.it/edu/bibliography-C.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014132130/http:/www.as8.it/edu/bibliography-C.html "http://www.as8.it/edu/bibliography-C.html")

Feel fre to contact me if you would like to contribute with a link, or for suggestions.  
Thank you. Best regards.

author: Alessandro Segalini
